section.p: A person entitled to VA benefits due primarily to their relationship to a veteran.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] asPerson, where its type is VA Person
The person who is playing the role of VeteranDependent

Contains exactly one [1..1] relationshipToVeteran with data type Code
A categorization of the person's relationship to the veteran; by virtue of which the person is entitled to certain VA benefits.

Contains exactly one [1..1] relationshipToVeteran with data type Code
A categorization of the person's relationship to the veteran; by virtue of which the person is entitled to certain VA benefits.

Contains exactly one [1..1] asPerson, where its type is VA Person
The person who is playing the role of VeteranDependent
